content.label:
A hard and smart game that can keep you busy for hours on end.
With puzzles that take time to figure out. Me and my dad love it and play it all the time üë®‚Äçüëß. I highly recommend this game, if you are in to puzzles, mystery, and horror/scary things.
No glitch‚Äôs, not at all bad quality, and life like. So go and check it out also you might want to do Room 1 first.

title.label: One of the best puzzle games

content.label: This game is truly puzzling,  I just finished it. My mind is still racing if you do not pay attention to every small detail you will have trouble moving forward. I love this game, about to download and play the next one.
I love The Room games! They have been my favorite games for iPad! The graphics and the puzzles are phenomenal! I hope more will keep coming.
Super graphics and sound!!! Creepy with out being over the top. Puzzles not too hard and fit the game well. Hint system present when really stuck. Fantastic job!
If you don‚Äôt want to purchase all of the games in this series, then don‚Äôt start! It‚Äôs only a matter of time before you purchase the next game! Don‚Äôt say I didn‚Äôt warn you! :)
The Room series is my favorite puzzle game series of all time! The second installment does not disappoint- the game is clever and challenging, and the visuals are nothing short of stunning.
This is truly the best game I have ever played!! Extremely well done!! I only have one complaint....the hints that guide you along the way are hard to read.
I hope you guys keep going! Please I love the challenge! The graphics and how mysterious it is well done!

title.label: Love it wouldn‚Äôt change a thing

content.label: This game I can beat and take a break from and realize there is more details I missed on the first play through. Brilliant. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

This game is certainly worth the small cost. Really good puzzles that require some thought. It‚Äôs not too difficult, but difficult enough to enjoy. There are enough hints provided that I could figure out which provided a few moments of ‚Äòway to go‚Äô.
Keeps crashing after I updated to iOS 14.1. I have always loved the game and will change back to five stars once this issue is resolved. For now, it is completely unplayable.
The art and design of The Room is beautiful and compelling. My only issue is that I wis each game was longer. I just want it to go on forever.

I‚Äôm not one to buy and play games on my phone. But I wanted a puzzle type game to keep me busy and found this. I‚Äôm glad I bought it! I couldn‚Äôt stop playing! The graphics are amazing and the puzzles are smart! I also love that it gets a bit creepy. My only complaint is that it‚Äôs so addictive, that I couldn‚Äôt put my phone down, and finished the game within a few days. Please make more of these games! I‚Äôll gladly purchase!

I love this game and the first one as well. I can‚Äôt wait for the next game. The graphics are amazing. I would like to have beautiful carved boxes. I know that they are not real. But they look real.  I hope you play this game and enjoy it as I have. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.
Had a great time figuring out the puzzles. Love the haunting affect especially during Halloween time! Enjoy!
These games are so well done. I love playing them.
So much fun playing!! The puzzles were challenging and so creative. Definitely thinking outside of the box! Cannot wait till 3!

I am very late to the party with these games but wow do they hold up. Just creepy enough, just challenging enough, and highly addictive, I haven‚Äôt been able to stop playing since I downloaded. Highly recommend for anyone interested in a high quality puzzle game with a mysterious plot.
Fun, love the mystery and the scariness of it. Maybe if I wouldn‚Äôt have used hints, it would‚Äôve taken me longer but I beat it in 2 days...

The game is very interesting, however, it is not long enough. I thoroughly enjoyed all the puzzles but there should be many more rooms! I‚Äôm hoping the next game in this series takes a bit longer to figure out and complete!
Very engaging and challenging.  On to Room 3!
Challenging and fun
Verrry creative!
Addictive game. Seems a little glitchy at times. Good back story
I absolutely love the first two on to the rest. I do have to say out of all the applications and games I‚Äôve played these are by far the best ones out there. I recommend the purchase game option.

First of all I‚Äôm a hard core chicken so I get scared and creeped out very easily and this was creepy I couldn‚Äôt play this close to bed and btw I‚Äôm 30 lol but the graphics and the puzzle aspect kept me playing it was a very creepy cool game highly recommend!

I was searching for a brain teaser type of game and I came across this game and I LOVED IT!! It‚Äôs like a virtual escape room. It was so fun! If you enjoy the real life escape rooms then you will love this!  Great job to the developers. One of my top favorite games that I‚Äôve ever downloaded. Can‚Äôt wait to download more.

I love the entire collection of The Room!! I‚Äôve gotten others to play it and it‚Äôs so hard to describe in detail. My mom started playing it and she was floored by the graphics & the intricate problems to solve. I rarely buy games on my phone but I‚Äôve bought almost every version. I think I have one left to play!?! Then what?!? I‚Äôm going to have to get VR just to play a new version?!? üòÇüòÇ
If you like spooky things and puzzles and escape the room like games this is for you! I‚Äôm obsessed!!!!!!!!
All the Room (Puzzle) Games are the best bang for the buck. I have them all and play them again every six months. HIGHLY Recommended.
Loved one and two is even better.  As a 65 year old woman this is how I challenge my mind and keep it young.  I have played other games but so far this one is the best.  Can‚Äôt wait to start three.
Brings Back fond memories of playing Myst and Riven. Well worth the $$!

Words don‚Äôt do justice for what is, in my opinion, one of the best puzzle games ever created. I played the Original The Room years ago which I felt at the time was an amazing game. The Room 2, like the first, doesn‚Äôt disappoint. 
If you want to play a game with incredible visual graphics, in an interactive setting, coupled with mysterious sounds and movements, then sit down and play these games. Whether you are traveling or just chilling around your home, these games are great at killing time as they really take your mind away into a challenging but not incredibly difficult game play as if you are in the game yourself. 
Honestly, These games are a treat. You will always look forward to playing and will only be let down after you have completed it because you just want more. Do yourself a favor and treat yourself to these games. You won‚Äôt regret it.

title.label: Too much real life, monotonous game, sad.

content.label: The Room was a great game. It expanded the level of focus you needed to solve a physical puzzle. The second. Not so much. If you‚Äôre ready to be locked into the physical view they give you, spend an hour looking for a single screw driver to something arbitrary, and just keep clicking around looking for stupid little things, then this is the game for you. It felt monotonous. You‚Äôre jumping ALL over a room, doing 3, 4, even 5 different things to solve one SMALL puzzle, not having a clue why they‚Äôd spread everything out. Your patience will go real quick. I try to not use the clue icon they give, and I‚Äôve done very well the last few games without using it. This one, you‚Äôre using the clue icon the entire time, because they spread the puzzle out over the ENTIRE room, with ZERO way of showing how it‚Äôs connected or where to start. They should have stuck to large boxes or giant tables. You‚Äôre so frustrated by the end, you‚Äôre not even excited, you‚Äôre just happy it‚Äôs over. I had high hopes for this game, and it completely let me down.

title.label: Awesome continuation of the first Room game!

content.label: This is an awesome series of games, I completed the The Room and was delighted to see there was a Room 2....and there‚Äôs more! Love the mysterious nature of the game and figuring out the secrets hidden is awesome, I fight the urge to look at the hints as I like to try as much as possible but a couple times I was frustrated and used the hints. But, it‚Äôs so much more rewarding when you can do it without the help of the hints, it gives you a better assurance of your own creativity and thinking outside the box so solve these puzzles. Thank you to the creators and please keep the Room games coming!
Still one of the best, next to Myst.
By far both first and second I‚Äôve enjoyed very much! Can‚Äôt wait to go onto next game! Love it! Keep on puzzling!
Really enjoy the intricate and unexpected puzzle solving! Great game.
I absolutely love these games!!! Love to solve riddles & puzzles... I can‚Äôt wait to move on to the next!!! Thank u for thinking up these games

I played the first room and loved it, and this one was amazing too.
There is only one problem: It can be laggy at times. It is really annoying when that happens, especially when the sound doesn‚Äôt quite match up with the visuals. Please fix this problem. Other than that, I love this game. Keep up the good work!
Play it!
I could not stop one I started. Amazing graphics and puzzles. As long as you guys keep making them I'll keep buying them!!!

This is an excellent game. Creative. Graphics are great and the game play is intuitive and fun. One of the highlights for me is the accompanying sounds. It really brings in another dimension. Highly recommend this!!

I‚Äôve played LOADS of games but by far the ‚ÄúROOM‚Äù games are the most intriguing, challenging games I‚Äôve ever played! And, there‚Äôs a great deal of satisfaction when you figure it out. Worth far more than they charge, it is well worth it!
The room games are great, excellent graphic detail, intricate puzzles with twisted cut scenes. Keeps you thinking of the next step or the clue. Awesome job.

title.label: Simple one of the best games for iOS

content.label: Love this game!!!!
Great game
I love all The Room apps! I want more!
Love these games!! Great way to focus my mind on something else these days :) very engaging

While it‚Äôs not necessary to play the first game, I‚Äôd highly recommend it. This game adds a bit more info to the very vague story. Just enough to keep you wondering what is going on. The puzzles in my opinion are excellent (albeit maybe a touch easier than the first game). I really like how in order to solve one puzzle you have to solve two other separate ones first. If you get stuck take a step back and look at areas you‚Äôve already examined. The hint system is perfect at nudging you along without spoiling the puzzle and giving you the answer. My advice play the first game then play this one. I know there is still two games after this one that I‚Äôm really looking forward to playing but if we support this game and developer enough they might continue to make games like this.
